app.title: Caesar Quest
app.pageDescription: Caesar Quest - A sleek web app where users crack a Caesar-encrypted message under pressure. Learn the principle through a short, playful story, then race the clock to reveal the secret text.

intro.legendText: In ancient Rome, Julius Caesar needed a way to send secret messages to his generals. He invented a simple yet clever method: shifting each letter in the alphabet by a fixed number of positions.
intro.challengeText: Now it's your turn! We've encrypted a secret message using Caesar's cipher. Can you crack the code and reveal the original text?
intro.rule1: You have <bold>5 attempts</bold> to guess correctly
intro.rule2: You have <bold>4 minutes</bold> to solve the riddle
intro.rule3: Use the slider to see the alphabet mapping for each shift
intro.rule4: Manually decrypt the message using the mapping table
intro.rule5: The answer will <bold>NOT</bold> be revealed if you fail!
